attributes.action:
Help Me Protect My Family Home Glenboig
No More Collateral Damage/Development
attributes.additional_details: Planning In Principle now allowing another road within 15 metres of my home to be constructed along with more housing development. Its just coming up on one year since a link road was constructed through the middle of the field next to us. Poor consultaion i.e. one day for link road, and no previous local development plan consultation has left us with limited choices. Transparency and Integrity needed from North Lanarkshire Council.
attributes.background:
Poor planning decisions, ongoing systemic failure to implement enforcements when breaches occurred.
5 homes suffered damage during contruction of Glenboig/Gartcosh Link Road.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could start a petition on North Lanarkshire Council's website:

https://www.northlanarkshire.gov.uk/index.aspx?articleid=32685

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
